snippet: Three congressmen want to know why, if dimethylamylamine, or DMAA, was deemed unsafe, supplement retailers are still selling it.
abstract: Three Republican members of House subcommittee open inquiry into safety of stimulant dimethylamylamine, amphetaminelike substance in some popular workout and fat-burning products sold at GNC; inquiry follows warning from Food and Drug Administration.

byline.original: By NATASHA SINGER and PETER LATTMAN

lead_paragraph: Three congressmen want to know why, if dimethylamylamine, or DMAA, was deemed unsafe, supplement retailers are still selling it.

headline.seo: Congress to Look Into Drug Known as DMAA
headline.main: Lawmakers Promise Review of Popular Workout Booster
headline.print_headline: Lawmakers Promise Review Of Popular Workout Booster
